scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Core_FriendshipList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#set ($queryType = $core_v2_widget.GetStringValue('queryType', 'currentUser')) #set ($enablePaging = $core_v2_widget.GetBoolValue('enablePaging', true)) #set ($targetUser = false) #if ($queryType == "accessingUser") #set ($targetUser = $core_v2_user.Accessing) #elseif ($queryType == "currentUser") #set ($targetUser = $core_v2_user.Current) #end ## if there is no accessing or current user, hide widget #if (!$targetUser) $core_v2_widget.Hide(); #end #set ($isUserAccessing = false) #if ($targetUser.Id == $core_v2_user.Accessing.Id) #set ($isUserAccessing = true) #end #set ($viewType = "Friends") #set ($viewType = $core_v2_page.GetQueryStringValue('Show')) $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('inSidebar.vm') #if ($isUserAccessing && !$inSidebar && $enablePaging)
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('unfriend_all') $core_v2_language.GetResource('follow_all') $core_v2_language.GetResource('unfollow_all') $core_v2_language.GetResource('done')
  • $core_v2_language.GetResource('edit')
#end $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('list.vm') #if ($inSidebar || !$enablePaging) #if ($queryType == 'accesingUser') #set($remaining = $total - $pageSize) #set($url = false) #set($url = $core_v2_urls.Friends($core_v2_user.Acessing.Id)) #if ($url) #if ($remaining == 1) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('And_One_More'), $core_v2_language.FormatNumber($remaining)) #elseif ($remaining > 1) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('And_Multiple_More'), $core_v2_language.FormatNumber($remaining)) #end #end #elseif($queryType == 'currentUser') #set($remaining = $total - $pageSize) #set($url = false) #set($url = $core_v2_urls.Friends($core_v2_user.Current.Id)) #if ($url) #if ($remaining == 1) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('And_One_More'), $core_v2_language.FormatNumber($remaining)) #elseif ($remaining > 1) $core_v2_language.FormatString($core_v2_language.GetResource('And_Multiple_More'), $core_v2_language.FormatNumber($remaining)) #end #end #end #registerEndOfPageHtml () #end #else #registerEndOfPageHtml('telligent.evolution.widgets.friendshipList') #end #registerEndOfPageHtml() #end #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:Core_FriendshipList_Name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="queryType" resourceName="Core_FriendshipList_QueryType" dataType="string" defaultValue="currentUser"> <propertyValue value="currentUser" resourceName="Core_FriendshipList_QueryType_CurrentUser" /> <propertyValue value="accessingUser" resourceName="Core_FriendshipList_QueryType_AccessingUser" /> </property> <property id="pageSize" resourceName="Pagesize" dataType="int" defaultValue="21"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="100" /> </property> <property id="enablePaging" resourceName="EnablePaging" dataType="bool" defaultValue="True" /> </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Displays a list of pending and approved ${friendships_lowercase}.
No users have been added to {0}'s ${friends_lowercase} list.
Are you sure you want to follow all of the selected people?
You are now following the selected people.
You do not have any followers yet.
You are not following anyone yet.
You have accepted a ${friendship_lowercase} request from {0}.
You do not have any ${friendship_lowercase} requests to review.
You have denied a ${friendship_lowercase} request from {0}.
No users have been added to your ${friends_lowercase} list.
You do not have any suggestions to review.
Are you sure you want to stop following all of the selected people?
You are no longer following any of the selected people.
Are you sure you want to remove all of the selected friendships?
The selected friendships have been removed.
显示待定和已批准 ${friendships_lowercase} 的列表。
尚未将任何用户添加至 {0} 的 ${friends_lowercase} 列表。
是否确定要关注所有所选用户?
现在，您已关注所选用户。
您已接受来自 {0} 的 ${friendship_lowercase} 请求。
您没有任何要审查的 ${friendship_lowercase} 请求。
您已拒绝来自 {0} 的 ${friendship_lowercase} 请求。
尚未将任何用户添加至您的 ${friends_lowercase} 列表。
您没有任何要审查的建议。
是否确定要停止关注所有所选用户?
您已不再关注任何所选用户。
是否确定要移除所有所选好友?
顯示待處理和已核准 ${friendships_lowercase} 的清單。
尚未將任何使用者新增至 {0} 的 ${friends_lowercase} 清單。
您確定要關注所有選取的人員嗎?
您現在正在關注選取的人員。
您目前沒有任何關注者。
您現在是 {0} 的 ${friends_lowercase} 了。
您已接受來自 {0} 的 ${friendship_lowercase} 要求。
您沒有任何 ${friendship_lowercase} 要求可檢閱。
您已拒絕來自 {0} 的 ${friendship_lowercase} 要求。
尚未將任何使用者新增至您的 ${friends_lowercase} 清單。
您沒有任何建議可檢閱。
您確定要停止關注所有選取的人員嗎?
您將不再關注任何選取的人員。
您確定要移除所有選取的友誼嗎?
